name: Soul Goal
description:
Your last journey has arrived, take it with a 2D game in which your best and only weapon is your computer mouse.

Drag, aim, shoot and...save your soul.

In order to display the game properly, always play it in full screen mode: after starting the game, you'll find the full screen button in the lower right part of the game screen.

I encourage you to leave a rating or a comment so I can see if you liked the game or not, and what I can do to improve it...Thank you!
